info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: Crumbling Armor
collection.openText: “Life is only granted to those who hold no fear of death.”

specialTipSize.specialTip: An Agent with Level 1 Fortitude was placed into $0’s Containment Room. After the Work Process ended, they were found with their head sliced clean off.

An Agent who performed Repression Work with the Abnormality was found to have an artifact ($0-01), which had the same chemical composition as $0. The Agent stated that it made them feel as if $0 were protecting them.

An Agent with $0-01 attached was ordered to continue engaging in Repression work with any Abnormality. Each time the Work Process ended, a physical examination on the Agent was carried out. The results of the examinations found that the effect given to the Agent by $0-01 changed in accordance with the number of times Repression work was done.
<CAUTION> Do not let an Agent with $0-01 perform Attachment Work. If they do, $0-01 will disappear with the Agent being decapitated as soon as they enter the Containment Unit, killing them instantly.
<CAUTION> If an Agent carrying $0-01 performs an excessive amount of Repression work, then the effect that the artifact provides will gradually become negative.
